titleStmt.title: Proposals to increase trade and to advance His Majesties revenue without any hazard or charge to any body, and with apparent profit to every body by M. Lewis.
titleStmt.author: Lewis, M. (Mark), fl. 1678.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
